title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.11 - Erection, removal of structures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.11 - Erection, removal of structures

State Regulations

The erection of buildings, seating stands or other
structures on the grounds of any racing association and the alteration or the
removal of any thereof shall be made only with the written approval of the
commission and the issuance of a permit therefor, after the filing with the
commission of a description thereof, with plans showing the detail of the same
and a detailed statement of the cost thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4207.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
